title: Gene Annotation Field
description: Schema for submitting a gene annotation field

field_name.title: Field Name
field_name.description: Original name of the annotation field name on vcf file

sub_embedding_group.title: Sub-embedding group
sub_embedding_group.description: If field belongs to a sub embedded object, add field name to that object

is_list.title: Is List
is_list.description: Whether the field is a list or not

separator.title: Separator
separator.description: if value is list, use this separator to split items

maximum_length_of_value.title: Maximum length of value (bytes)
maximum_length_of_value.description: Maximum number of bytes this field can hold

description.title: Description
description.description: Description to be used in the variant schema for the field

pattern.title: Pattern
pattern.description: Regex used to validate field entries

do_import.title: Do Import
do_import.description: Whether this annotation field is currently available on the portal

link.title: Link
link.description: Base link used to lookup this field

default.title: Default value for this field
default.description: For defaults/min/max only type=integer is available

value_example.title: Example Value for this field
value_example.description: Example Value for this field, stored as text

enum_list.title: Enum List
enum_list.description: List of possible values for this field if applicable

annotation_category.title: Annotation Category
annotation_category.description: Category used for this annotation, could be used for grouping

facet_order.title: Facet Order
facet_order.description: Ranking number of the field wrt to Facets, lower is better

column_order.title: Column order
column_order.description: Ranking number of the field for Column in search view (lower is better)

scope.title: Scope
scope.description: Scope that this field belongs to

schema_title.title: Schema Title
schema_title.description: Title to be used in the variant schema for the field

embedded_field.title: Embedded Field
embedded_field.description: Whether or not this field is embedded from another object

calculated_property.title: Calculated Property
calculated_property.description: Boolean on whether or not this field is a calculated property of a variant
